name: Danger Zone (itch) (POWERD STUDIO)
description:
Many have entered, but no one has returned... Welcome to the DANGER ZONE. 

In the year 3027, technology has made time travel a way of life. 

Cubicon, your home planet, has been destroyed by meteorites. A team of explorers ventured out to find a new place to call home. 

Unfortunately, while travelling through space, they got lost in a series of wormholes.

Your mission is to navigate through deep space, locate the lost team of explorers, and make your way back home. 

But be warned, because once you enter, there's no looking back because you're in... the Danger Zone.

 KEY FEATURES:

  • Multiple paths of destruction 
  • Fast-paced, colourful  eye-catching levels
  • Easy to learn, harder to master for challenging and addictive gameplay
  • Fun family game for all ages

DO YOU WANT TO SUPPORT MORE AWESOMENESS? 
HERE'S HOW:

  • Download & share our game
  • Donate to help us continue to create more cool games for you
  • Spread the word with your friends and family
  • Join our community by following our socials! - we love hearing your feedback

We appreciate your support - Thank you for playing!

Follow us on our socials: @PowerdStudio
